thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: Tobias

author: Tobias
title: Tobias
text:
They didn't deliver. After 5 days and contacting PayPal myself to get my money back they offered refund. I agreed. Instead they delivered the flowers. They didn't want to give my money back, just the delivery.
After asking why they even offered refund, they said I get my money back in 7 days but the flowers will be picked up again.
I wanted to send happiness. This company is just giving frustration. Never order there!
